title: The Adventurer v 2.0 - Orchestral Fantasy Music
description: Version 2.0 with additional tracks is now available! If you have bought the pack already you will get these songs for free! This pack is a great starting point for your game with music for many different situations.
longDescription:
Version 2.0 with additional tracks is now available! If you have bought the pack already you will get these songs for free! This pack is a great starting point for your game with music for many different situations.


You will get 15 original songs in this pack with 10 variations & 17 loops. The added tracks will make the pack more complete and cost effective for my customers. 


1. PRO AAA-QUALITY MUSIC that instantly elevates the experience of your game.

2. YOUTUBE-SAFE music that can be freely used without any copyright concerns.

3. FREE FUTURE UPDATES so get your copy today!

4. HIGH QUALITY 44.1 kHz 16-bit music wav files.


Listen to the pack here:

Teaser (Youtube)

Full Playlist (Soundcloud)


Sounds like

Dark Souls

Elder Scrolls

World of Warcraft

The Witcher

God of War


This pack includes

15 full original main tracks

10 variations (minimal melodies, ambient & stingers)

17 loops (in different length and intensity)

80+ minutes of music (in total)


I will add new songs to my music packs over time. These songs will be Free for customers that already own the music pack in question. If you haven’t received the new tracks please send me an email so I can send them to you asap.


These songs are a mix of epic, intense, energetic, triumphant and emotional, making it perfect for dramatic adventures, battles, boss battles, high-energy cut scenes, and more.


Youtube-Safe Music

My music is Youtube-Safe and can be freely used without any concerns of copyright strikes, flags, or demonetization. This is essential when players showcase your game in videos or streams for YouTube, and other similar platforms.


You will not get a copyright claim and you are allowed to use the soundtracks wherever you want and as many times as you need Royalty-Free! Use the music over and over, in any of your projects or productions, without any additional fees.


[Main Tracks]

1. Menu Theme [3:42]

2. Victory [0:28]

3. Death [0:45]

4. Loss [2:26]

5. Combat [1:39]

6. Boss Fight [2:25]

7. Running [01:51]

8. Riding [2:04]

9. Suspense [1:18]

10. Stronghold [1:44]

11. Peaceful Town [2:49]

12. Preparing [3:12]

13. Frontier [3:43] - NEW!

14. Triumph [0:08] - NEW!

15. Failure [0:10] - NEW!


Instructions

I have made each track in 2 versions "lite" and "full". The reason for this is that I don't know how much intensity and sound effects you will use in each particular part of your game or project. The lite versions have minimal melodies and are more background-music-like. 


A bonus is that you can use this to extend the track and get more variations by using the "lite" version first, then transition into the "full" version and then back to the lite version.


About Me

All the music is composed, produced, mixed and mastered by me. I’m an independent music composer that loves to write music for the orchestra. My goal is to offer high quality music at an affordable price and make you get a lifetime of value from it through Free Lifetime Updates.


The music is written, produced, mixed and mastered by me and I’m not using AI in any way while creating my music. My music is 100% made by me.


It’s you as a game developer or editor that will be my customer (hopefully) and I want my music to serve your project as well as possible. Let me know if you have any questions or suggestions. I’m also interested in hearing about the game/project that you used my music for if I may. I will give you a shout out if you like!


Thank you so much for supporting my music!
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 42

Number of Audio Cues: 42

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 Hz / 16-bit

Does music loop: Yes (17 tracks)

Minutes of audio provided: 80+ Minutes


Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
  • Any: Yes
